sql.getFileInfoPartitioned: SELECT DISTINCT t.part_d part_d FROM meta_manager.hdfs_file_info t
sql.getFileInfoCount: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT path) total FROM meta_manager.hdfs_file_info WHERE part_d = '$partD'
sql.getFileInfo: SELECT DISTINCT path path, `replication` replicationCount, modification_time modificationTime, access_time accessTime, preferred_blocksize preferredBlockSize, blocks_count blocksCount, file_size fileSize, ns_quota nsQuota, ds_quota dsQuota, permission permission, username userName, groupname groupName, part_d partD FROM meta_manager.hdfs_file_info WHERE part_d = '$partD' ORDER BY path LIMIT $limit OFFSET $offset
